text: This lists rank the largest retail companies according to the British consulting firm Deloitte. == By revenue == Companies are ordered by revenue from retail operations in millions of US Dollars in FY 2017. Carrefour S.A. was excluded from the 2017's report at the company’s request. The list does not include Wakefern Food Corporation with revenue of US$16.3 billion in 2017.http://www.supermarketnews.com/retail-financial/wakefern-retail-sales- rise-15-fy-2017. {| class="wikitable
